text: Ara abasya'i amara bani isara'ilake utkrsta abasabhumite basabasa karalama [1] ebam amara taderake uttama riyaka dilama, atahpara tadera kache jnana asale tara bibheda srsti karala [2]. Niscaya tara ye bisaye bibheda srsti karata [3] apanara raba tadera madhye kiyamatera dine setara phayasala kare debena
